Take your steps to get better prepared for the French Foreign Legion selection tests! The Legion Training App is built by someone having served in the French Foreign Legion for almost a decade. 

Legion Training is a training app that helps you to get better prepared for the French Foreign Legion selection tests. If you want to enlist in the French Legion, you have to pass several challenges, including a fitness test and IQ tests. The Legion Training app is here to help to take those challenges successfully. The app also includes a French language vocabulary specific for French Legion new joiners and other utility features to provide a comprehensive toolset.  

Fitness workouts come with descriptive and visual guidance. Several IQ test types helps you to improve your logical thinking and enhance your ability to solve IQ tests. Learn French words with accurate pronunciation that’s useful already in the beginning of your journey. Check out the general requirements and required credentials to enlist yourself for selection test. You can move to your recent activity directly from the main interface. 

For more info about the French Foreign Legion and to read about my experience you can visit legionstories.com. 

== Legion Training App 
We aim to create an all-in-one Legion Etrangere / French Foreign Legion preperation app to increase volunteers’ chances who are wanting to join to serve in the French Legion to pass the selection tests. We do our best to provide you with features and trainings that can help you to take the challenges 


1. LOGIC TRAINING
Are you good at solving IQ (Intelligence Quotient) tests? Wanna improve your logical and spatual reasoning skills? The IQ test in the French Foreign Legion mostly consists of logical reasoning tests, spatial reasoning tests and numerical reasoning tests. The Legion Training app lets you explore and solve logic tests of different types including numbers, shapes, dominos, matrixes, and more and helps you to get better prepared!

2. PHYSICAL TRAINING
You need to get your army fitness ready. The app provides fitness exercises and workouts that helps you to prepare for French Foreign Legion fitness selection test. This physical training course consists of starter, intermediate and advanced fitness training plans. 
Different exercises are included in your daily lessons like running, burpees, planking, squats, pull-ups, push-ups, sit-ups, etc. All these fitness exercises are given with their descriptions and visual illustrations to make trainees better understand. 
 
3. LUC LÉGER / PACER / BEEP TEST TRAINING 
One of the fitness tests you need to pass is the Luc Léger Test (also called Pacer or Beep test). You can find Luc Léger test feature in the Legion Training app to test yourself if you can make the minimum scores to get enlisted. 

4. LANGUAGE TRAINING
Learning basic French vocabulary helps you to find your place in France and within the French Foreign Legion. Therefore, we have selected some important categories of words such as food, equipment, orders, security, human body parts, etc. So, volunteers can learn writing structures and pronunciations of words in both English and French languages.
You can test your prior vocabulary knowledge by solving language tests. Swipe right to mark as known and left to mark as unknown.
